admission_text:
## An Option for Everyone…

* * *

> “The only way to understand painting is to go and look at it. And if out of a million visitors, there is even one to whom art means something, that is enough to justify museums.”

— Pierre-Auguste Renoir

### $30/year

**Impressionist Membership**

  * Invitations to exhibition openings and programs

  * Discounted price on ticketed events

  * Subscription to quarterly newsletter

  * 10% discount in Museum Gift Shop

### $100/year

**Realist Membership**

  * All of the above benefits

  * Admission to more than 700 museums nationwide as part of the North American Reciprocal Museum Association (NARM)

### $50/year

**Romanticist Membership**

  * All benefits of the Impressionist level for entire household

### $250/year

**Expressionist Membership**

  * All of the above benefits, plus 20% discount in Museum Gift Shop

### $500/year

**Renaissance Membership**

  * All of the above benefits, plus invitation to a Renaissance & Old Master member exlusive event

### $1000/year

**Old Master Membership**

  * All of the above benefits, plus recognition on a permanent plaque in the museum gallery

## _Begin your membership journey today!_

[ CLICK HERE ](/store/membership)

collections_text:
## The mission of the Zigler Art Museum is to be a dynamic cultural center with an emphasis on art education and the development of Louisiana artists.

[ ](https://louisianatravel.com)

## 154 N. Main St  
Jennings, LA 70546

[ Get Directions ](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Zigler+Art+Museum/@30.2213125,-92.6603654,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x863b5980326cf16d:0x9bdf2de465068361!8m2!3d30.2213079!4d-92.6581767)

* * *

Open Monday through Saturday  
10am–4pm

Admission:  
**FREE**

## Follow us on social media…

* * *

[ ](https://www.instagram.com/p/C_Txik8RQB2/)

We are proud of our community’s support of our mission to nurture, strengthen, and enrich lives through creativity—for folks of all ages and backgrounds. One way you can help us achieve this year after year is by attending a Fine Wine & Dine fundraiser! Bring a friend or a loved one to enjoy a four-course steak dinner with wine pairings expertly curated to accompany each course. While supplies last, you may even purchase a bottle (or three) of your favorite wine to enjoy at home! The night “winds down” with a lively auction of pieces donated by local artists. Tickets are $125 per guest. All proceeds go directly to supporting Zigler Art Museum.

[ ](https://www.instagram.com/p/C-YGbbyRGza/)
